title: sAmajavara
sahitya:
sAmajavara.  rAgA: madhyamAvati.  tALA: Adi  sAmajavara gamana sAkEhAvAsa


anupallavi

  kAma janaka kali kaluSa vibhanjana nAmadEya rAmacandra mAmava
kOTi madana samAna saundarya kAmini kula tilaka vidEhAtmajA
saudhAminiyuta nIlAmbOdha lilAbrddhanUlAvaNya


caraNam    dAsharatha suta kOsaladuhitru sukrta dharaNi kulatilaka lakSmaNa pUrvaja
kushikathanuja anusaraNa kinnapada guha sannuta karuNArasa jaladhara
